attributes.name: Dragon's Breath
attributes.description: Dragon's Breath
attributes.parsed_description: Dragon's Breath

attributes.name: Dragon's Breath Bow
attributes.description: "Few gaze into the maw of the dragon and live to tell the tale."
attributes.parsed_description: "Few gaze into the maw of the dragon and live to tell the tale."

attributes.name: Dreadwake
attributes.description: “The feared pirate commander succumbed to the corruption. His ship would appear around the shores of Aeternum, his axe in hand, and all that followed was death and destruction.”
attributes.parsed_description: “The feared pirate commander succumbed to the corruption. His ship would appear around the shores of Aeternum, his axe in hand, and all that followed was death and destruction.”

attributes.name: Dreadweaver
attributes.description: "Do you fear me now?"
attributes.parsed_description: "Do you fear me now?"

attributes.name: Dreamcrusher
attributes.description: "The only thing more certain than time itself is the failure of mankind to rise above its own self interest."
attributes.parsed_description: "The only thing more certain than time itself is the failure of mankind to rise above its own self interest."

attributes.name: Dreamhacker
attributes.description: "I live more in my dreams than I do in my life."
attributes.parsed_description: "I live more in my dreams than I do in my life."

attributes.name: Dreamseeker
attributes.description: "Let my arrow bring you to a deep, dreamfilled sleep."
attributes.parsed_description: "Let my arrow bring you to a deep, dreamfilled sleep."

attributes.name: Driftwood Recurve
attributes.description: "The pirates shaped the bow out of wood they found at sea. How lucky for them that they would come across imbued wyrdwood near the shores of Aeternum."
attributes.parsed_description: "The pirates shaped the bow out of wood they found at sea. How lucky for them that they would come across imbued wyrdwood near the shores of Aeternum."

attributes.name: Drillanov's Cleaver
attributes.description: A hefty weapon for all your chopping needs.
attributes.parsed_description: A hefty weapon for all your chopping needs.

attributes.name: Drowned Mariners Chanty
attributes.description: “Bring us a tale of good winds and glory / Way ho, we're off to Aeternum / Sing us a song, a wonderous story / Way ho, we're off to Aetrnum”
attributes.parsed_description: “Bring us a tale of good winds and glory / Way ho, we're off to Aeternum / Sing us a song, a wonderous story / Way ho, we're off to Aetrnum”

attributes.name: Dunweald
attributes.description: "There are many places that remain sacred to the Dryads. Defending these holy sites is of the utmost importance to them."

attributes.name: Duplicitous Intent
attributes.description: "My intentions surely are pure."

attributes.name: Duskbringer
attributes.description: "Lights out."

attributes.name: Duty Bound
attributes.description: "We are bound by a vow. We will not break."

attributes.name: Dying Light
attributes.description: “The light went out in his eyes as I tried to bring him back.”

attributes.name: Dynasty's Demise
attributes.description: "The vision of the Empress must be fulfilled, no matter the cost."
attributes.parsed_description: "The vision of the Empress must be fulfilled, no matter the cost."

attributes.name: Dynasty's Rise
attributes.description: "The truly elite soldiers of the Dynasty forces are their spearman. Their agile movements and unbreakable will made them a deadly force poised to conquer any who stood in their way."
